snippet: Jason Kidd, who became a Nets legend long before he became their head coach, will have his jersey retired next month, the team announced Monday.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets coach Jason Kidd, legend long before he became a head coach, will have his No. 5 jersey retired in October.
lead_paragraph: Jason Kidd, who became a Nets legend long before he became their head coach, will have his jersey retired next month, the team announced Monday.
